outputs.output_descr: The Joint Programme on Avian Influenza - Phase II will support enhanced coordination, building on the support provided during Phase I

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project goal is to prevent the occurrence of pathogenic Avian Influenza and to build Vietnam's capacity to prevent trans-boundary, emerging and zoonotic infectious diseases of poultry.

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
-  Strengthening Surveillance and Response
-  Assess Capacity of Curative System
-  Education and Training: development of a Field Epidemiology Training Programme (FETP).

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
- Strengthening Veterinary Services
- Disease Control
- Surveillance and Epidemiological Investigation
- Poultry Sector Restructuring

project_descr: Avian and Human Pandemic Influenza UN/Government Joint Programme phase II:  Strengthening the Management of Public Health Emergencies in Viet Nam - with focus on the Prevention and Control of Diseases of Epidemic Potential, including Avian Influenza
project_title: UN Joint Programme on Avian Influenza - Phase II
